soc.message
Class BuildRequest

java.lang.Object
  soc.message.Message
      soc.message.BuildRequest
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class BuildRequest
extends Message

This message, from client to server, says which piece type the current player wants to build.

During game state PLAY1, this is a build request during the player's turn. When sent during other game states, and other players' turns, this is a request to start the 6-player Special Building Phase.

Author:
Robert S. Thomas
See Also:
Serialized Form
